alert.note: Alert for Clay; Fillmore; Nuckolls; Thayer (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 22 at 12:09AM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT NORTHEASTERN JEWELL...SOUTHERN CLAY...NUCKOLLS...WESTERN FILLMORE AND THAYER COUNTIES THROUGH 100 AM CDT... At 1209 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Clay Center to near Oak to near Hardy. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Davenport, Hardy, Ruskin, Oak, and Ong around 1215 AM CDT. Deshler, Shickley, Carleton, and Byron around 1225 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Hebron, Chester, Belvidere, Geneva, Bruning, Strang and Hubbell. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
